title: Which champion would you want to have a relationship with?

replies.body: For a _relationship_? I'm thinking {{champion:16}} - she's nice, serene, and her powers are likely only going to be used for good. Plus, she's probably got a dick, which I like.

> [{quoted}](name=xo Janna xo,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=HvEdhNXk,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2016-01-19T14:31:09.940+0000)
>
> Taric

GEMS GEMS GEMS  'cheats on u with ezreal'
m8 itss all about this champ most hottest an sexyest champ OCE {{champion:421}}

Vel'Koz

Who wouldnt want to wake up to a handy from those 3 tentacles

And i doubt vel would say no to giving you a reach around sandy after you shot a brandy

You want to have a relationship with a robot who doesn't entirely understand feelings, A dragon, a Mute woman (i mean i doubt that's a relationship in itself, unless sign language comes in, and sona isn't shown to know any of that, though i mean, a woman who doesn't talk back, that's like sexism's dream isn't it?) and a female, who is probably gonna kick your ass for being a slob that plays video games.
